Package es.uam.eps.ir.relison.diffusion.io.backup

Class BinarySimulationWriter<U extends java.io.Serializable,​I extends java.io.Serializable,​P>

java.lang.Object
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.diffusion.io.backup.BinarySimulationWriter<U,​I,​P>
Type Parameters:
U - Type of the users.
I - Type of the information pieces.
P - Type of the parameters.
All Implemented Interfaces:
SimulationWriter<U,​I,​P>
public class BinarySimulationWriter<U extends java.io.Serializable,​I extends java.io.Serializable,​P>
extends java.lang.Object
implements SimulationWriter<U,​I,​P>
Writes a simulation into a file. Data is stored in binary fields, storing the identifiers of each object.
